definition: A device commonly found in households that is utilized for cleaning floors and surfaces by sucking up dirt, dust, and debris.

examples.german: Ich muss den Staubsauger benutzen, um den Teppich zu reinigen.
examples.english: I have to use the vacuum cleaner to clean the carpet.

examples.german: Meine Mutter hat einen neuen Staubsauger gekauft.
examples.english: My mother bought a new vacuum cleaner.

examples.german: Der Staubsauger saugt den Staub effizient auf.
examples.english: The vacuum cleaner efficiently sucks up the dust.
I changed the vacuum cleaner bag.
